value.title: Add a domain to your Power BI tenant (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can add a domain to your Power BI tenant. This is done by adding the domain through Azure Active Directory or Office 365.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.
